title: Really liked before update
text: I enjoyed playing this game when I first downloaded it.  Nice time killer. Now they did some update and it loads ads halfway through the level. So this 5 second ad gets you pushed off the edge and you have to restart the level. Which causes the ad to play again. Then if you manage to finish the level there is another ad. For about every 30 seconds of game play there is 10-15 seconds of ads. I deleted it. So now they get less revenue. Was the extra ad worth it?

title: Way too many ads
text:
So I play quite a few games and am no stranger to ads playing cause its a free game but this is excessive.

Most games put an ad at the end of a level and even then generally not every time as to not upset the player.  But this game puts then in the middle of gameplay 

Thats right I played a level where it paused game play (sometimes twice) to play a 30second un-skippable ad

Its an ok game other wise but not worth the headache

title: Was great until..

title: Ads

title: Update has too many ads

title: Fun game bad ad placement
text: This game was great until they stated putting ads in mid level, then when it‚Äôs over there‚Äôs a period where you have no control of your guy.  Ads between levels are fine, but mid level is just crazy. Otherwise I was really enjoying it.

title: Great game but....
text: I love this game but... I play free games consistently but the adds usually push me away after about a week. Granted the adds work on me because I usually end up downloading 2 or 3 games because of them. In this game the adds were perfect, not too many to where it was still bearable to play. But once I got to the purple people another add popped up in between zones. These adds seriously effect the flow of the game and make it difficult to pick up where you left off. Unfortunately I think I will be deleting this game soon. Great game but not worth paying for to remove adds.

title: Hate ads
text: Fun but the ads are a dealbreaker.. i hate them .. they literally just pop up while I‚Äôm in the middle of a game that‚Äôs so annoying.

title: Problems with update
text: I am going to give this game 4 stars because I‚Äôm literally addicted to it. I am happy to see new enemies and different character choices, however it is irritating that ads are now popping up two to three times in the middle of playing a level. Before the update there would be an ad between each completed level which I expected and didn‚Äôt mind. Hopefully this can be fixed otherwise playing games where you‚Äôre constantly interrupted by ads kills it for me and I end up just deleting the app.
